title: INSTANT POT LASAGNA
directions: Create Ricotta Cheese Mixture: In a mixing bowl, beat one large egg, then add in Â¾ cup (200g) Ricotta cheese. Season with 1 tsp (1g) Italian seasoning, ground black pepper, and â…“ tsp kosher salt.

Assemble Instant Pot Lasagna: Line a 7-inch springform pan with cut-out parchment paper (optional). Break the uncooked oven-ready lasagna noodles into smaller pieces, then layer them at bottom of the pan in a single layer. Layer â…“ portion of the meat sauce on the lasagna noodles. Layer Ricotta cheese mixture on the meat sauce, then add shredded mozzarella cheese on top. Repeat this layering cycle twice. Add Â¼ cup (30g - 40g) freshly grated Parmesan cheese on the very top. Then, wrap the springform pan tightly with aluminum foil.

Pressure Cook Lasagna: Pour 1 cup (250ml) cold water, then place a trivet in Instant Pot. Create a sling foil, then place springform pan in Instant Pot. Close lid, then pressure cook at High Pressure for 24 minutes + 10 minutes Natural Release.
Optional Broil Lasagna: Preheat oven to 425Â°F when Instant Pot is natural releasing. Place the cooked lasagna in a 425Â°F oven until the cheese is browned on top (~7 - 9 mins).
Serve: For an easier release, use a paring knife to gently release the Lasagna from the springform pan. Slice the glorious lasagna and serve immediately. Enjoy~ ðŸ™‚
ingredients: 2 cups (150g - 180g) Mozzarella cheese , shredded in large pieces
